message: Concerned about this review coming out a bit late? Our new editor comes on board Wednesday, June 15th. At that point we'll be standardizing our review submission process and aim to turn out reviews on a regular and timely basis.
Well worth the read: Daniel Starkey takes on L.A. Noire http://tehpwngaming.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=149%3Adkow&catid=47%3Alast-added-tutorilas&Itemid=56
